homeScreen.title: Orange⁺
homeScreen.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to move this card to trash?

emptyCard.header:
Your QR Codes
All in one place
emptyCard.content: Keep your banks, wallet, membership QR codes, loyalty cards, and more all in one convenient place. Stay organized and access everything you need quickly and easily.

permissionScreen.cameraSubtitle: To scan QR codes, we need permission to access your device's camera.
permissionScreen.imageSubtitle: To scan QR codes from images, we need permission to access your photo gallery.
permissionScreen.locationSubtitle: To scan for nearby Wi-Fi networks, we need permission to access your location. You can decline this request, and Wi-Fi scanning will be unavailable.

onboardingScreen.title: Orange⁺
onboardingScreen.subtitle1: Collect, organize, and store QR codes for bank accounts, loyalty cards, and digital wallets with ease.
onboardingScreen.subtitle2: Seamlessly backup and sync your QR codes across all your devices.
onboardingScreen.subtitle3: Access your digital collection anytime, anywhere - no wifi, no worries!

termsOfService.agreementPrefix: By tapping continue, you're cool with our
termsOfService.termsOfServiceContent1: To make sure everyone has a positive experience with our QR code saving app, we have a few ground rules. These rules help ensure responsible use and protect our community.
termsOfService.termsOfServiceContent2:
Here's our friendly ask:
*Keep it legal and kind. No harmful or inappropriate content allowed.
* Respect privacy. Always get consent before sharing someone's QR codes.
* Keep your account secure. No sharing, no worries!
termsOfService.privacyPolicyContent1: We value your privacy. We collect minimal information to provide and improve our services. This includes your name and email address for account personalization and communication.
termsOfService.privacyPolicyContent2:
*Your data stays with us. No third-party sharing without your go-ahead.
* Top-notch security measures to keep your info safe and sound.
* Full control. Delete your account anytime you want.

settingsScreen.title: Settings
settingsScreen.confirmLogoutMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?

themeScreen.title: Appearance
themeScreen.successMessage: Please restart the app to see the changes.
